solution_line_template: That means he reads {hours_per_day}*{pages_per_hour}=<<{hours_per_day}*{pages_per_hour}={pages_per_day}>>{pages_per_day} pages per day
So he reads {pages_per_day}*{target_days}=<<{pages_per_day}*{target_days}={total_pages_in_7_days}>>{total_pages_in_7_days} pages in {target_days} days
